Constructor Detail

BaseWidget

public BaseWidget(BaseWidget.WidgetBundle bundle)
BaseWidget constructor. This constructor is used by the system and should not be overwritten or used for instantiation.

Parameters:
bundle -
See Also:
onCreate()
Method Detail

onCreate

public void onCreate()
Called when the widget is starting. This is where most initialization should go.

getWidth

public abstract int getWidth()
Get the widget width in pixels. Is written to the Registration.WidgetRegistrationColumns.WIDTH field.

Returns:
The width.

getHeight

public abstract int getHeight()
Get the widget height in pixels. Is written to the Registration.WidgetRegistrationColumns.HEIGHT field.

Returns:
The height.

getPreviewUri

public abstract int getPreviewUri()
Get the widget preview image resource id used to describe this widget to the user in the host application settings. The string resource is written to the Registration.WidgetRegistrationColumns.PREVIEW_IMAGE_URI field. ExtensionUtils.getUriString(Context, int) can be used to retrieve the string from a resource id.

Returns:
The preview image URI as a string.

getName

public abstract int getName()
Get the widget resource name used to describe this widget to the user in the host application settings. The string resource written to the Registration.WidgetRegistrationColumns.NAME field.

Returns:
The name.

getCategory

public int getCategory()
Get the widget category. The string resource written to the Registration.WidgetRegistrationColumns.CATEGORY field.

Returns:
The category
